content.detailedDescription: It was late. midnight or later. i was in the army, training in the woods of ft. benning. week 12 of a combination of basic training, and ait (in my case, 11bc2, or infantry dragon gunner). we had set up our shelter halves (tents), and four of us were having a cigarette before turning in. we were stargazing when one of us pointed out a star that seemed brighter than others. easily as bright as jupiter. i suggested that it was probably jupiter when it seemed to double in size. within three seconds, it grew to double in size and brightness, then it split into 3 smaller points. these points originated in the center and radiated out. as they did, they trailed light behind. the center went out. the three points of light remained steady, at a distance of approximately two fingers apart, for about thirty seconds. then they blinked out, one by one. no star i had ever seen had ever done anything like that. we all looked at each other, and somebody asked what we should do. fearing ridicule and career alteration, we agreed to not say anything. it was almost 30 years ago, and i remember it like it was last night.
content.summary: One becomes three, then none

content.detailedDescription: This is a short (25 seconds) video accidentally shot when my daughter tried to record the sound of birds chirping. she was in bed and placed her phone behind the mini blind to better hear/ record the birds. imagine our surprise when she showed us the recording. it is of a sphere descending behind the building next to my home. sight of sphere begins at 17 or 18 seconds and appears from behind the chimney and moves to the north before descending behind the building. it is difficult to see. i am hoping your staff can analyze this and determine what it is or is not. this was all realized after the fact. my daughter (22 y.O. at the time) is the only one to say how she felt at the time of occurrence. please reply even if you think it is nothing. we were told that it was discussed on coast to coast am by one of our daughters friends.
content.summary: Daughter accidentally filmed while trying to record bird sounds in morning, difficult to see, but something is there, over building next door

content.detailedDescription: I got off work at 2am was driving home i was going up this big hill in aurora indiana at the top of it i noticed two dull lights it looked like maybe a mile or less in front of me they were low to the ground i tried to catch up to them and i couldnt i drove for at least 12 miles to try to catch up to them in indiana in feb theres nothin ever going on that late at night its a rural area the moon was shining bright i got to moores hill and the lights disappeared i thought that was strange i drove into milan i kinda forgot about the lights i remember going by my old high school looking up at the bright moon and saying to myself theres something in the air tonight and kept driving i got a mile and a half away and was turning left and to my right a little above tree top level there was this huge and i mean huge aircraft come up on me i seen it flyin like fast and stopped on a dime offto the right of me it wasnt exactly over me it was to the right of me a little bit i start freaking out but as soon as i started freaking out a calming sensation came over me it was real wierd and i had to drive a quarter of a mile down the road to take a left up my mothers driveway and it was right there with me i went up my mothers driveway its a couple of hundred yards long parked and ran up to the house and this aircraft whatever it was just hoovered there i was standing on moms porch lookin at it for a long time it was shaped like a pool rack it had layers to it like different floors or levels to it and it was huge and i mean huge it was hoovering over a pond thats 3 acres and it made it look small only a 100 ft in the air maybe not that much it knew i was watching it no doubt about it and then it took off in lightning speed no sound no smoke nothing it was gone in a blink of a eye i went inside and called the ripley county sheriff's dept and asked them if anyone called in and reported any ufos and of course they laughed and thought i was nuts and i ttold them i was serious then they knew i wasnt fooling around and asked me about it and told them wat im tellin u and asked me my name but i didnt tell them cause they thought i was nuts when i first called and thats wat happened that night when i seen ufos over illinois and some people seen pretty much wat i saw and it was in the same time frame i thought that was interesting thinking im not the only one who saw it i bet no one saw it like i did stationary like i seen it for at least ten minutes all this im saying is the complete truth
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: A huge ufo flew right over me and stopped

content.detailedDescription: Was shooting some pictures of the sun when i noticed some objects seeming to move through the sequnce of photos . i was at my buddies this picture is off my face book and is a jpg but i have a nikon d3200 and this is a 55/300 lense . im mostly concernd the picture is some kind of foul up do to dust or dirt .
content.summary: Took pictures with a sequence of objects in motion

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out for evening drive in the amish country and we spotted what i first thought was a large hot air balloon,  but as we got closer i did not see any lines or rope attached to it and it was not moving at all.  we saw a vapor coming off it and i said "looks like some kind of smoke coming off it, but then i realized smoke rises and this vapor was falling to the ground, we watched it for about 30 minutes and it did not move,  then a car came up behind us and we had to move as it could not pass on this country road.  again this object appeared to be at least 75 feet in diameter and was leaving off this vapor which was falling to the ground.
content.summary: Large  sphire  and was emitting off some sort of gas vapor falling to the groung

content.detailedDescription: While outside observing the stars facing north around 2130 tuesday 9, june 2015,i noticed an object come from my right side at 66 degrees from the horizon (east)and move at good speed to the north by northwest. the object was bright white, brighter than the background stars and was made no noise as it passed in front of me in less than 15 seconds. there were no clouds to my right from which is the direction the object came from. this object then passed above the clouds which were around 15,000ft-20,000ft (used the sandia mountains a reference for altitude) to the northwest my (left) and still reaming bright till i could no longer view it when it passed over more cloud cover to the northwest. it's altitude i would say was 22,000ft to 28,000ft and traveling faster than previous objects i have seen. there were no navigational lights or flashing lights on this object and the speed was faster than a passenger plane a cruising speed. at the time of the incident i did try to record this but the cameras from my phone and sport camera couldn't pick anything. this is do to poor night viewing quality of the cameras, not from the object. there were no other aircraft in the area and no other witnesses at the time of the sighting to my knowledge. my cat was unaffected by the sighting. what surprised me about this sighting is the speed at which the object traveled. other objects i had seen moved slowly across the sky this object cleared the same areas as the others in less than 15 seconds as compared to up to 2 minutes from other sightings. hoping to get a better camera with better night quality viewing to capture these on tape. i trying to contact please leave a message as i might not be there to answer any inquiries but will return calls. best time to call 1600hrs-2200hrs. thank you
content.summary: Object moved from east to northwest in under 15 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was staying at chateau on the lake in branson , mo, it's a very high class hotel over looking table rock lake on a 500 ft bluff. at 9 pm my wife and about 25 other people were over looking the lake after sun down and a woman started screaming "hey what's that in the sky?" as we looked out a red ball of light went across the sky, then out of nowhere a second ball came up next to it and they flew for about a half mile then totally disappeared then poof 2 more came where those 2 started and took same path and disappeared same spot , then poof 1 more out and traveled same thing and disappeared same way after a half mile. i didn't have my phone on me but there were a few people taking video, they were all there for a users group convention i have 1 of the guys business cards he saw it too. we had the best view to see these objects nothing in our way we were high in the air and we knew it wasn't sight seeing helicopters because the lights came out of nowhere, and then vanished within a half mile, it's like they came to see us looking off the balcony. ya i had a couple beers but was not drunk, but when 25 to 30 people all see the same thing, it's not coincidence.
content.summary: 30 people witnessed 5 objects going over table rock lake

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen many ufo shapes in no ca since i was a child.  but i want to report this one due
to the it being visible and then invisible depending on a light flashing on it. 

this occurred about 14 years ago (although i've seen others in more recent years including 
a couple of years (2013) ago and also about 4 years ago)  

i was driving north over the golden gate bridge and as i was nearing the north end of
the bridge i could see an object against the rocky hill close to the waldo grade tunnel.
as you come off the road and onto pavement, there was a middle section where 
tow trucks and other emergency vehicles can park.  traffic moves on both sides
to this lane.  the tow truck had it's propeller turning and the propeller had red
lights.  the ufo only appeared when the red light shinned on it.  
when the light was off of it, the ufo was invisible!   as the propeller
turned and the red light shinned on it, i could see the ufs for a few seconds
at a time.  since i was traveling toward it, i had a very limited time to see it.
it was disc shaped and had at least 3 levels and each level was smaller than
the previous one.  there is a similar illustration on shutterstock.  it's image id is
70711765. however this image is still not accurate.  i did question if what i was
seeing was real and if i was really looking at rocks in a ufo shape against the
hill.  i've looked at this hill many time and i've never seen any rock formation
that could look like what i saw.  

i am documenting this sighting over all others because you can
use a red light to view an otherwise invisible ufo.  at least i was 
able to.  it's worth investigating and installing on us aircraft that might be
called to investigate a live sighting.  

locations where i've seen other ufos include: napa, novato (over area called
"black point" which is all flat land, larkspur near the larkspur landing 
ferry terminal, lagunitas in the country, etc.  i've seen all different shapes
and lights. when i was a child i questioned if i was being spied on by ufos
because i would wake up in terror inside my bedroom and felt like something
was inside.  this was during a time when i was seeing ufos in the sky. this
was many years ago where there were only a few wineries in napa.  there
were many orchards around with fruit trees until the technology was available
to put vineyards on hills.  all of my sightings were in no california.   i reported
many to the police but not all of them.  many sightings were when we didn't
have cell phones.
content.summary: Ufo invisible unless a red light from a tow truck propeller shinned on it. golden gate bridge location

content.detailedDescription: Driving home with my friends from the lake early morning, there was three of us in the vehicle, when in the blink of an eye the highway was bright as day light then dark by the time we could look up to see what was going on the object had passed over junction city, we could see it in the distance it was pretty far off from us but it stopped moved left to right so fast that we all became overcome with fear and a feeling of we just seen something we shouldn't of, we all went to the radio station and got the attention of the late night dj we told him we seen something and his reaction was what color was it we told him and he stated it had been seen over several towns in ks, ok, co, and mo. i wished i could of gotten pictures of it though. ever sense then i'm always looking up at night it was one of the events in my life i cant forget
content.summary: Drivng home with friends object passed over the car and by the time we looked up we could see it in the distance

Ive tried repeatedly to tell the truth, i need hypnotic regression 
call to discuss
949-407-9275
content.summary: Call to discuss 949-407-9275 don barak

content.detailedDescription: Three of us decided to hike silver creek falls trail at night. we got there before dark and proceeded to hike the trail when approximately three hours later we were coming into a clearing looking up at the great view of all the stars when from above the treetops this huge luminated boomerang shaped object with evenly spaced lights around the bottom of it slowly flew directly over us. we all watched it till it was gone. but when it was gone we found ourselves standing back to back to back.(weird) the entire bottom was luminated reddish orange with lights evenly spaced around perimeter also glowing lighter in color
content.summary: We were all stand in small clearing in woods when it hovered just over the treetops above us all

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from work at about midnight. saw an object in the sky, kinda orangish heading south. at first, i thought shooting star but it was going too slow. then it suddenly stopped after passing by me, flared out w/ blue/green light the just vanished. it hovered before vanishing for about 5 seconds while i watched it.
content.summary: Flew across the sjy, emitted light, then just disappeared

content.detailedDescription: In 65 or66 visited my aunt with my parents her dog was excessively barking outside i volunteered to go out and get her they lived in a rural area no other houses close when i found her i looked up to see what she was barking and hoveri√±g above a large tree was a dome-circle ufo lights where on bottom circleing counter clockwise top lights were clockwise  a orange-red beam came down and the next thing i remember was just standing there holding the dog took her back and everyone was upset they had been searching for me for over an hour my time reference seemed no more than a few minutes. later that evening i discovered a small incision on my hand and years later i dug out a small chip looking metal piece.
content.summary: Hovering above tree top dome shaped lights top going clockwise bottom counterclockwise

content.detailedDescription: At or about 2300 hrs. during the summer of 1987 or 1986 i was on my boat anchored at haverstraw bay, just south of the indian point power plant, in new york. i noticed an object in the sky moving south at a very slow rate of speed. it displayed four spotlights evenly spaced along the front of the object. the object was silhouetted against the night sky. what amazed and puzzled me, that based on based on it's rate of travel and it's altitude, it should have fallen out of the sky to the water. what puzzled me further was that it made no noise. it reached a point which was almost directly overhead when it stopped forward movement, turned at proceeded back in the direction in which it came, finally disappearing from site. at the time of this sighting i was a detective sergeant with the ossining new york police department.
content.summary: Slow moving object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
In a mysterious incident, a young boy in uttar pradesh's kanpur city has claimed to have spotted an unidentified flying object (ufo) early on wednesday morning.

the boy was going through the pictures of early morning clouds he had snapped when he spotted the 'fying saucer' and alerted his parents about it.

"i like nature photography and when i saw various shapes of clouds in the sky i started clicking pictures on my phone. while i was going through the clicked pictures in the photo gallery, i saw a round object in the photographs and when i zoomed to take a closer look at it, i noticed it was a ufo," the child said.

his father, santosh gupta, too confirmed that the saucer-like object looked like a ufo.

"when we checked the pictures snapped by son, we saw red light spotting around the white coloured round object and it appeared as if white smoke was emitting from the centre of the object," gupta said.

the boy and his family live in kanpur's shyam nagar area,
 
gupta even claimed that the photographs are real and it can be verified at any lab for its authenticity.
content.summary: Ufo in india? kanpur boy clicks pictures of a 'perfect' unidentified flying object

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i were out in the back sitting on our chairs taking in the evening,watching the jets coming into ontario airport,they were about 25,00,or alittle less,when my wife said "what is that" i looked up and above the jets were two round craft,just sitting,just under a high ceris cloud deck,the clouds were i would say about 30 to 35,000 ft,i went in to get my camera,but when i came out they were gone,my wife said while i was inside,they bout came close together,the parted one went nw and the other she said went ne,if someone is really interested you can call me at home,my home phone 909 570 9951  this all happened on june 1,at around 7pm
content.summary: We were in back yard,when my wife saw it first, appox 30,000 to 35,000 feet above us

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i was standing in front of our house waiting for a ride to our boy scout meeting when my brother said look ,i look up and there was a ship hovering over top of us right above the maple tree in front of our house.The ship didn't make a sound,it had lights on the bottom of it .The ship was at least 50 feet wide.Days later my sister and i was watching tv when we heard glass brake upstairs ,so we ran to the neighbors and the neighbor came over to the house to check the house to find nothing broke.I asked my brother years later if he remembered it and he said no.I believe that something happened to my brother and sister because they were never the same after that.
content.summary: My brother said look i looked up and it was hovering above us above the maple trre in front of our house

content.detailedDescription:
Nighttime i was standing on a small second floor balcony overlooking the alley talking to a friend's sister. it was her apartment. something, possibly a very low frequency hum, caused us to pause and look up in a slight northerly direction. the balcony was on the east end of the building which was a 2 story structure. i saw clearly from street and city lights a very large triangular flying craft moving very slowly toward us. it went overhead traveling south and disappeared over the tree tops. it made no sound that was noticeable unless it was very low decibel level. it was a quiet night and i do not recall any traffic which would come in waves when it did as denver had street lights that were synced so traveling at speed limit one would hit all green lights. time of night was a factor in the quiet. the craft had no lights, no visible windows, no markings and seemed close enough one could hit it with a thrown rock. after it disappeared from view the woman and i just looked at each other with stunned surprise and unspoken "did you see that?" eyes.  we went inside and told the other 2 inside what had happened. they seemed only a little interested. i was sober but may have smoked marijuana at some point prior as was our habit to do. the marijuana was not powerful in those days unless one spent extra money for more potent product which would be rare for us considering our financial situations. we rarely drank alcohol or imbibed in any other mind altering substances for that matter. the whole incident was about 15 to 20 seconds in length. probably was close to 11 pm.
it was quite remarkable to me immediately that what i was seeing was flying so slow and was quite large and virtually silent. no engine sounds and no air friction sounds and i would estimate it traveled at about 20 mph. i looked for any marks such as numbers, letters, doors windows or lights and it had none of these on the underside and had no visible sides. it appeared to be fairly flat from my angle of view. it was predominately (90%) dark or drab green and the triangle tips were rounded not pointed and were a dark drab burgundy color. it was low enough to be illuminated by mercury vapor street lights. i never at any time thought it to be anything of human or earthly origin as flight must have a sound and aircraft must have lights. also it was flying too low within a mile of downtown denver. never heard any reported sightings of it by others. any mention to this day is of little interest to anyone. i do not have much interest in alien/ufo stuff or sci/fi. i am more reality based person and find "mystical" beliefs to be mostly nonsense. i never believed roswell was a ufo crash site or that aliens were found. i do not believe mind-reading or psychic abilities exist. most mysterious occurrences have explanations. i believe it is possible other beings exist somewhere but why they want to come here i find to be odd considering how much it would take to travel that far. humans would have to be to them what ants are to us. the scale of size of human existence though is oddly similar as per reported alien sightings but abilities seem to be quite dis-similar. memory plays tricks and eye to brain communication is not as exact as most think. a magician can astound people although they know full well that there is no magic involved. i personally knew a magician name of steve aldrich. amazing magician with jaw dropping tricks but not real magic. i can make a coin "disappear" in a bandana...
i do not know if it is related or not but it was in this time period that i started experiencing debilitating anxiety attacks and still do to this day. the woman, i was learn years later, had been institutionalized with schizophrenia at some point. she was not helped by medications and had very little lucid thought and acted childlike. i had known her to be responsible, independent and sometimes pleasant but quick to anger which could be off-putting. i had no interest in her other than she was a friend's sister and she had let us stay from time to time at the apartment if we needed. the friend and i were typical long-haired guys with acoustic guitars, not uncommon in those days and that area ("capital hill") she was employed as a maid in a large denver hotel (the raddison i believe) i worked for a macrame/weaving supply business called strings and things. i was supervisor of the jute and wool dyeing department which was small and only had 3 or 4 part-time employees.
it was a remarkable event that somehow nothing could be done or said and was rarely if ever recalled by me until i became a member of the computer amd internet age. i did some research on the 'net and saw a number of similar episodes but they all seemed to be later in time and the triangle was the only common theme. others all had lights and sound plus were far off sightings.
content.summary: Triangle, large, dark colored underneath, dark red corners, no lights, no sound, no features

content.detailedDescription: Iwas driving hghy103 from halifax to hubbards. around five island lake on my left i saw a cigar shaped objecti thought was the size of a tractor trailer with flames of green red and blue with black smoke.St.Marys university observatory said it was a fireball and it was 60 miles of the coast of nova scotia go figure.
content.summary: A cigar shaped object  decending at about  30 degrees.

content.detailedDescription: It's about 2:30 in the afternoon very sunny day no clouds in the sky.  my friend and i and older next door neighbor we're walking to the beach. as we walk along the boardwalk in the sand dunes as soon as we saw the ocean,, about 10 or 12 or more lights ascended down from space. they began zigzagging across the sky extremely fast faster than anything ever. they were pulsating flashing and zig zagging. we watch this for 35 minutes or more with hundreds of people on the beach watching it as well. then about that time, 2 jet fighters flew in from the south breaking the sound barrier.That was the first time i had ever seen a jet breaking the sound barrier in real life. as soon as the jets got to the location generally of the lights, the lights shot straight up in to space seemingly. as we follow the lights up, we see another object this one is very big and is right over top of us. it seems to be camouflage or cloaked with 3 red lights on each in of the triangular shaped craft.While we are looking straight up at this object, the military jets are flying around in circles trying to track the objects that had shot straight up into space. this lasted a good 45 minutes. daytime absolutely clear sky. the triangular shaped object seem too high for the jets to get too.Then the objects seemingly faded away into the distance until we couldn't see it anymore it was very big.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Daytime light fell from space.Orb like flashing very fast and moving in a zigzag patern back and forth across the sky super fast right in front of us with lots of people seeing to over 100.Lasted 40mn then 2 jet fighters flew in from the south breakisound

content.detailedDescription: Please call me at the cell phone listed above please take a few minutes of time and call these are  very interesting sightings thank you maybe you will believe me
content.summary: 1st moving in a pattern like a heartbeat monitor 2sd like a jellyfish 3rd silver disk 4th white light

content.detailedDescription: I was in the army military camp on hard duty with a unit of a national guard soddenlly we saw this light coming from the top of the maintain we hide in the trees thinking that it was a hellicopter but the big thing came on top of us and studd there then i came out and begin to cheek the object to see if i recognize it but the thing has no windows i could see the metal like silver all lights around and in the middle in the center of the object was a big white been that was on top of me i walk around covering mi ages because the light won't let me see i call my friends but they were afraid i was with my rifle but i wave to them that i was not going to fire to them the thing was making a sound like bees i wave to them to come down but they stud there suthenly they went straight up at a speed that no plane of this world never had a dissapeared then we call to raar control to check if they notice something and was negative then we all new it was a u f o
content.summary: Big vehicle came flying and stud on top of me my companion were hiding under the trees.

content.detailedDescription: My family was on our way home from property my pops bought. i rode in the front seat with my parents because of motion sickness. my mother said look as we sat at the red light. it was a bad angle looking up and to the right so nobody else in the car could see. we saw a disc shaped object with lights around the perimeter. i think they were red,blue and white. it's been almost 50 years ago so my memory has faded. i remember it was almost dark and as we watched the disc it took off at a high rate of speed. no noise present during this time. it went far away and super fast. then 2 more joined and then all 3 went different directions out of sight. i'd like to add that we did not speak of this until just before my mother died. i felt that i had to ask her to be sure that this happened. her description was exactly what i remember. i told my brother after speaking with my mother and it all got bigger. he ask me if i remembered the lights in the woods when we were little boys. i  said i remember my mother being made fun of because she called my grandmother freaking out about the lights in the woods. then my brother said do you remember that we went in the woods for a   look.Boom like a ton of bricks my memory came back. tears are in my eyes just thinking about it. we discussed it and agreed on what we saw. a disc shaped object with a ring of white light similar to a sidewalk around it. there were human like creatures walking on the ring. i was so afraid they might see us. then i don't remember anything. i have had bad dreams my whole life. this dream happened countless times when i was younger, mostly before age 10.We left windows open during the summer in the south. so in the dream i see this bird like mechanical thing fly in through the window. instantly i think it is watching me and reporting what it sees.I have other dreams that include humans hanging upside down in bags. they have humans in charge and you had to have an id card to leave the facility. i'm thinking that whoever reads this will laugh and say here is another nut case.
content.summary: Before my mother died i ask did we see the same thing. yes was the answer. we saw a disc with lights hovering over the intersection. i't took off at high speed and 2 more joined it then all 3 went different directions

content.detailedDescription:
In 1965 i was 11 years old and living in middletown (woodland hills) ky.
my friend and i had run over to eastern high school from our elementary school (jane hite) to give her brother a message. 

there was a wooded area between the two schools and a field.  i remember us walking into the wooded area and the next thing i remember is walking in the open field with her a few feet behind.  she all of a sudden started screaming and when i turned around to see what happened she was pointing up.  i looked up and there it was this huge cigar shaped object with windows running its length. it made no sound.  it was gray and the windows were dark. i was unable to see anything inside. i turned to her to say stop screaming and when i looked back up it was miles away and i could only see the back of it and then it disappeared.

we ran home as fast as we could. she to her home and me to mine. when i got in the house my mother could see that i was very upset and i told her what happened. 

i do not recall if it was the same day or the next that a man showed up at our home in a military uniform (air force) and identified himself to my mother and said he was with operation blue book.  (i recall my friend telling me her father was in the military.) i'm not sure what all there conversation was about but, she told me to go with him as they had some questions for me and my friend.

as i walked to his car my friend was already in the back seat. after we were in the car he gave us the rules. we were not allowed to talk to each other and in a little while he would ask us to close our eyes and put our heads down and not open them until he said so.  if we didn't think we could do this he said he had blind folds for us to wear.  we told him we did not need the blind folds.

perhaps it was 30 minutes later when he told us to close our eyes and put our heads down. with in 10 minutes or so he stopped and spoke to someone and continued on for a few more minutes. i believe we had stopped at some sort of gate and were let in. he then came to a complete stop and instructed us to get out of the car where we entered a single door and another man in uniform was waiting. he took my friend and we were separated at this point.

i was taken into a small room and he got me a soda. he then started to ask me questions about what happened and what i saw. he asked me if i knew what a blimp was and i said yes i had seen one at the texas state fair. he was taking notes and i believe there was a tape recorder as he asked me to speak up a couple of times. he then pulled out some paper and asked me to draw what i saw. i did.  he then took my drawing and left the room for several minutes.

when he returned he had a picture album and asked me if any of the pictures looked like what i saw.  there it was the exact same object we had encountered. a few minutes later my friend an i were taken back to the car with all the same rules in place. no talking, eyes closed and heads down. after a few minutes we were allowed to look out the windows of the car and i was taken home first.

upon arriving home he walked me to the door and spoke to my mother. he asked if he could speak to her alone and i pretended to go to my room. my mother asked him what happened and his reply was that we identified the same object and they believe we were telling the truth.  he then cautioned her that we should probably not share what happened with anyone. people might think i was lying or crazy.  my mother's response (we both know it truly happened!)

i never saw my friend again. i always assumed she moved.
content.summary: My friend and i encountered this cigar shaped ufo walking home through a field

content.detailedDescription:
In october 1979 i was driving with a friend down a rural road in lake city, arkansas (population 2,000). as we cleared the tree line we observed a large circular craft with orange and yellow lights around the bottom of the craft hovering about 50 feet above the home of our local sheriff. his home sat at the intersection of the road we were travelling on and catfish drive. we accelerated to the crossroad and stopped on the street in front of his home when four friends driving toward us (south) on catfish drive stopped along side of us. the craft immediately flew straight up and to the west at an amazing rate of speed and suddenly disappeared from view. we heard no sounds from the craft but the individual lights that circled the under carriage of the craft, appeared to pulse in a rotation pattern and were visible for about two seconds during the craft's assent. we were literally within 50-100 feet from the craft. 

we all (6 of us)discussed it and decided not to report it for fear that no one would believe us. recently, i confirmed my recollection of the events surrounding that experience with the friend i was in the car with some 30+ years ago, and his memory of the event was the same. i thought it was time to finally file a report. i didn't do this before because i was a military member for 30 years. i am now retired. the person i was riding with was mike owens. the person driving the second car was michael fry.

what has always been in the back of my mind is that our sheriff had a picture-perfect family and home. he had three sons, all who had bright futures. closely following the event we witnessed, his oldest son quit college, became an alcoholic and eventually committed suicide by crashing his car. i often wondered through the years if this event was related and if by speaking up we might have made a difference. the middle son also passed away but the youngest son has thrived in life.
content.summary: Driving late at night and observed round dome object with lights underneath hovering over local sheriff's house.

content.detailedDescription: My husband & i had just been to church in oklahoma city. we headed back to norman & had stopped at a convenience store. we drove a short distance & commented that it was just 12:15. we had gotten out earlier then most services we have attened. the next thing we knew we were both asking at the same time" what time is it & where are we?." we looked at the clock & it was now 2:15. we both could not figure out what had happened & where were we. we figured out we were on the opposite side of town from where we had been  but it would not have taken us 2 hours to get there. both of us just knew we were missing 2 hours. we felt strange like we had just woke up & at the same time but that was all. we still do not know what happened to the 2 hours. we told a close friend a few years ago & she told me that she & her husband had had the same thing happen to them in another state & they too lost 2 hours.
content.summary: Did not see anything. we left church & were heading back to norman. we looked at the clock & ,it was 12:15. the next thing we knew both of us said at the same time " what time is it & where are we"  the time was now 2:15 and we were on the oposite sidetow

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were on the way home from work, back roads from birmingham al. leeds area, to gadsden ,al. after about hour and a half i noticed a white almost too white object, noticed dark of the branches in front of it, then as fast as you can blink, it was right by me, it seemed as i could almost touch it, then my dad said ,there's another 1! i looked out his side of car and there it was, only traveling at around maybe a couple hundred feet or maybe more it was hard to tell. then i looked at mine as his was traveling in the direction of the 1 on my side...As the 1 moving toward the 1 on my side, it stopped it seemed like right above it, then the 1 on my side stayed for a few more seconds, then slowly moved upward toward the other 1, at that time they just sat there, for a few seconds, and all the sudden, faster than can be imagined, they took off straight up, and i watched the best i could and i noticed them as a pinpoint at this time, and they seemed to be entering space...Then my dad looked at me and said, " if you ever repeat this, i will swear you are lying, i laughed, he said no son, i ain't kidding, i'll tell them you are lying, never tell a soul. he is dead now, and i have wrestled with telling this ever since...Now i have, i feel better, whether you all believe it or not...I know what i saw. and it was not my personal first time, that happened when i was about primary school age, it was a small orb orange, with a blue like flame or something all round it. it entered the house ,i was paralyzed, and just watched as it sat in mid air right by me at maybe 3 ft. then it shot off at an ungodly speed allthru the house, and out the back, after that i had dreams about it for years off and on, then, me and my dad had our experience. i have not had the dream ever since. maybe they did not enjoy me, but i'd give anything to see another 1.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw no entities. 1st 1 was seen at 3:00 low and immediate move to my 3:00 low right up to me, then my dad saw 1 at 9:00 hi moving left to right, then it stopped and the other joined and bam straight up less than a second

content.detailedDescription:
I have all ready reported this,but i found out our locial dj country station 101 saw it too.When i reported you guys hadnt heard about it.It was about the triangel we all saw over a ridge n rosville close to ridgeland high school n 97.
i sat parked rt under it for 5 mints still freaks me out.Dont give a crap what no one else belives i know what the heck i saw was not our stuff.Still blows my mind an to belive it all my sis n brothern law saw it 3 days later on same ridge.
almost got devorced over it.
my wife is so into church she was rt there n still wants to make up excuses.
i was go n home with my wife n bb n the car around 11 heading east on hyw2a.From the foot of lookout  mnt.When i pulled up to a red light i looked a top of ridge an saw something got my attention.
my wife said it was reflection from ball feild at high school.
i laughed at her an told her just to shut up,cause it was sunday nite an the school was on the rt side of ridge.I drove on threw light proceded up hill.Asi got closer my mind rambeled to make since of what im seeing.
i proceded to tell the ms just shut up an pulled over n the middel of hyw an rolled my window down.I drove a crown vic you couldnt hardly hear it run.This thing was hughe hovering over the ridge didnt make a sound.I had to turn my head left in rt to see it all.
it had a straw of light hitting the tree tops.Only way i can describe it is some thing from star wars.Has changed my life 4 ever.Just a few years bk a locail 101 dj talked about see n it.Thought to my self what took so long.I waited all week to say some thing cause i thought for sure their be news about it.I new i could not be the only 1 that saw it.
content.summary: Drive n home parked rt under hughe triangel

content.detailedDescription:
In the early 70s playing out side my friend and i saw a huge green glowing circle above our street. the circle at the end of our street seemed to be the center point for this glowing hovering object. being kids we ran in the house to get our parents and neighbors. several people came to the street and watched the hovering whatever.
one ran in side and called the airport and someone else called navy base. to my knowledge i do not know if they ever reached any one at the base. my mother said we had to go inside the house. never knew how it left or what it was...
content.summary: Round glow stick green round circle above my street as a kid many neighbors sighted this as well

content.detailedDescription: I was living out in l.A. at the time and it was nice and warm out, kind of overcast overhead. i was outside walking around just enjoying the night. sunset had occurred an hour or so earlier and happened to look up at the sky. that's when i noticed a weird small blue light off in the distance, at about a 45 degree elevation from the horizon. as i stood there and looked at it, i noticed that it just didn't look right and the longer i watched it, the weirder and bigger it got. i couldn't believe my eyes and started getting a little scared. so i figured i had better go and get some of the other guys to come outside to look at this thing, because i wanted verification that i was actually seeing this and that i wasn't crazy! so i did just that. after a few people came outside and looked up and saw what i was pointing at, several of them ran inside to tell other people to come out.The longer we stood there, the bigger it got until it was about the size of a quarter, if you held it at between two fingers at arms length. then it just disappeared. this whole thing took about 45 minutes or so. it scared everybody there., some ran back inside and the rest of us stood there in misbelief and could not figure out what it was, that just happened. i have never been that scared in my life. i actually thought it was the end.
content.summary: Small blue light growing into big blue light,with a weird foglike haze behind it.
